message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $950,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your position, however, the value of this product is quite high and $950,000 falls short of what I can accept. I'm willing to come down to $1,200,000. I believe this price reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet your price. I would like to propose an offer of $1,100,000 for the product.
